item.title: This Car Is Not In Great Condition!
item.description: A closer look at an older El Camino with noticeable wear — exploring its condition and the work needed to restore it.

media:content.media:title: This Car Is Not In Great Condition!
media:content.media:description: A closer look at an older El Camino with noticeable wear — exploring its condition and the work needed to restore it.

item.title: Trade Or No Trade — Who’s Getting The Better Deal Here?
item.description: A car negotiation unfolds as both sides weigh options — see who might get the better deal in this classic trade scenario.

item.title: There's A Repo Order For Her Ex-Husband's Truck!
item.description: A repossession case unfolds as a truck is targeted under a repo order — highlighting the process and challenges of vehicle recovery.

item.title: Would You Hand Over The Keys If Someone Came For Your Car?
item.description: A tense moment as a car owner faces a repo situation — exploring the challenges and emotions involved when a vehicle is being reclaimed.

item.title: Would You Pay $3,500 For A Sunken Beauty Like This?
item.description: A vintage car pulled from years of neglect — but is it worth the $3,500 asking price? Take a closer look at this classic find and decide if it’s a deal or a project.

item.title: They Hired A Company To Haul The Bunkhouse!
item.description: A team is brought in to move the bunkhouse at the jade site — showcasing planning, coordination, and heavy-lifting work in action.

item.title: Ted Loves This Car Show!
item.description: Ted explores a car show filled with stunning vehicles — appreciating design, craftsmanship, and automotive innovation.

item.title: Fantastic Show To Celebrate Canada!
item.description: Enjoy a vibrant show filled with fireworks and festivities — a memorable celebration honoring Canada’s culture and spirit.

item.title: They Have Three Days To Finish The Car!
item.description: The team races against the clock to complete a car restoration — precision, skill, and teamwork are key to meeting the tight deadline.

item.title: Will He Buy The '68 Chevy Buford?
item.description: A potential buyer evaluates the classic ’68 Chevy Buford — weighing its condition, style, and value before making a decision.

item.title: Their Time Is Very Limited...
item.description: The team faces a tight deadline at the car show — every moment counts to prepare and showcase the vehicle perfectly.

item.title: Restored '56 Cadillac Can Be Worth A Lot Of Money!
item.description: A fully restored 1956 Cadillac could be highly valuable — showcasing classic design, craftsmanship, and the appeal of vintage cars to collectors.

item.title: $300K on the Line — Will It Pay Off?
item.description: Tension builds as a $300K jade deal hangs in the balance — will the investment pay off for the miners and their team?

item.title: Every Part Brand New… No Corners Cut!
item.description: A beautifully restored vintage car brought back to life with all-new parts and attention to every detail — true craftsmanship in motion.

item.title: These Sports Cars Are Absolutely Fantastic!
item.description: Take a closer look at these incredible sports cars, featuring Ferraris and Fords — a showcase of design, speed, and automotive excellence.

item.title: They Found A Buried El Camino!
item.description: A long-lost El Camino is uncovered, revealing a hidden piece of automotive history and the excitement of a true classic find.

item.title: One Wrong Spark Could Ruin It All!
item.description: A reminder that even one wrong spark can be dangerous — careful preparation and safety are essential when setting up fireworks.

item.title: The New Painter Will Start Working On The Apollo!
item.description: A skilled painter begins work on the Apollo car — bringing fresh talent and precision to restore and enhance the vehicle’s finish.

item.title: $350 Truck vs. the Derby!
item.description: A budget truck faces its toughest test yet at the derby — see how it holds up in this fun and challenging ride.

item.title: They Want A Vehicle To Take Them Cross-Country!
item.description: The team searches for the perfect vehicle built for long drives, reliability, and comfort on their cross-country adventure.
